name: Scene 91.3 - take 2
description:
Journal entry - shoot day 7

"We powered through. We are 5 days away from shooting and $1000 in debt. We need to secure another $6000 to finish the shoot. Viktor is putting in $2000. Even though he has no visa and is running out of money. The fire burns too bright. We've come too far to fail" 

100% of the money raised will go to finishing this truly independent film and paying the artists. Four years of blood, sweat and tears. A cult classic in the making.

AUS/NZ Distribution: Pivot Pictures, Filmink Presents

PR + Trailer: https://www.grass-fires.com/blog/milesawaytrailer

8/10

Photographer: Gerard Wood
